Green Beauty Cosmetics Mineral Face Balm

Brand: Green Beauty Cosmetics

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Active ingredients: Titanium Dioxide 6.4%, zinc oxide 11.4%, inactive ingredients: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Beeswax

oconut) Oil, Beeswax, Iron Oxides, Theobroma Cacao (Cacao) Seed Butter, Kaolin, Vanilla Planifolia (Vanilla) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Sweet Orange) Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Oil, Tocopherol

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Cancer, Use Restrictions; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxi
